text: 33|59|Hē nabī! Tumi tōmāra straīsakalaka, tōmāra jīẏaraīsakalaka ārau muminasakalara straīsakalaka kōraā, tē'ōm̐lōkē yēna tē'ōm̐lōkara cādarara kichu anśa nijara ōparata ṭāni laẏa. Ē'iṭō tē'ōm̐lōkaka cināra sahaja upāẏa, phalata tē'ōm̐lōkaka birakta karaā naha'ba. Āllāha parama kṣamāśīla, parama daẏālu.
